sense.def:
One's bones
so trdi deli v človeškem telesu, ki sestavljajo okostje.

seg.quote: Its eye sockets are encircled by bone.

sense.def:
To bone a piece of meat of fish
pomeni odstraniti kosti iz kosa mesa ali ribe, preden ga skuhamo.

Orodje ali okras, ki je
bone
, je izdelan iz kosti.

To feel
ali
to know something in your bones
pomeni biti o nečem prepričan, čeprav ne znamo pojasniti zakaj;

seg.quote: He felt in his bones he could do it.

sense.def:
To make no bones about doing something unpleasant or difficult
pomeni nekaj neprijetnega ali zahtevnega storiti brez oklevanja;

cit.quote: ne zmrdovati se, ne vihati nosu
